name: Just Wash
description:
This is a simple game, just wash the bosses car. Simple? Well the more you FAIL at this simple task the GREATER the reward. BTW, make sure you hit full screen because if you don't, it doesn't look right.

Creators:
- Programmer - David Greenwood
- Artists - Jetpack

Consider supporting us if you would like. It would be greatly appreciated for I have never made anything on a game before and would like to start my dreams as a LEGENDARY Game Dev.
